There is nothing I can say that hasn't already been said -- probably the greatest puzzle game of all time. Builds upon the foundation left in the original Portal & improves it in every way. Also, Co-Op is such a blast with a friend. Highly recommend this game all around to anyone really -- it is an all-time classic.
